Container.Name: Homebox
Container.Overview: Homebox is the inventory and organization system built for the Home User! With a focus on simplicity and ease of use, Homebox is the perfect solution for your home inventory, organization, and management needs
Container.DonateText: Don't donate to me! Instead, please donate the creators of the apps, but if you insist

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: log level to use, can be one of: trace, debug, info, warn, error, critical

Config.Name: Log Format
Config.Description: log format to use, can be one of: text, json

Config.Name: Maximum fil upload size
Config.Description: maximum file upload size supported in MB
